amendment.description: To provide additional funding for rural education, rural health access, and rural health outreach programs.

vote.text: Amendment SA 215 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 215 proposed by Senator Salazar. (consideration: CR S2831-2832; text: CR S2831) To provide additional funding for rural education, rural health access, and rural health outreach programs.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 215 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 215 proposed by Senator Salazar.
